content.raw:
I just uploaded libzip. I built zlib, but I had to modify libzip in two places make it compile:

* disable compilation of bzip2 support since bzip2 wasn't found (already done on master, just not in the most recent release https://github.com/nih-at/libzip/commit/84072ae6cc50aa36c00ebb9493e4bb9a45a8bf63)
* disable compilation of regression tests, since they need dlfcn.h

a new jenkins build is queued
content.html:
I just uploaded libzip. I built zlib, but I had to modify libzip in two places make it compile:

  • disable compilation of bzip2 support since bzip2 wasn't found (already done on master, just not in the most recent release https://github.com/nih-at/libzip/commit/84072ae6cc50aa36c00ebb9493e4bb9a45a8bf63)
  • disable compilation of regression tests, since they need dlfcn.h

a new jenkins build is queued

content.raw:
I built and uploaded windows binaries for curl, jsoncpp, and libyaml (with a hack for libyaml) but I had trouble with libzip:

* libzip depends on zlib, so that needs to be compiled too
* libyaml doesn't have an install target (ie. `make install` returns with an error code), so I manually created a zip file with include/yaml.h and the compiled static library
content.html:
I built and uploaded windows binaries for curl, jsoncpp, and libyaml (with a hack for libyaml) but I had trouble with libzip:

  • libzip depends on zlib, so that needs to be compiled too
  • libyaml doesn't have an install target (ie. make install returns with an error code), so I manually created a zip file with include/yaml.h and the compiled static library

update.description:
It requires [this branch](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/branches/compare/fuel-tools%0Ddefault#diff) from Ign-cmake until [~~#32~~](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/pull-requests/32), [~~#33~~](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/pull-requests/33), [#35](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/pull-requests/35) and [#36](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/pull-requests/36) are merged.

Related PRs:

* ~~[Homebrew](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/358).~~
* ~~[Release tools](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/506/ignition-cmake-for-fuel-tools/diff)~~.
* [Release repository](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-fuel-tools-release/pull-requests/2).
